entities.description: The frequency of responses without any weighting applied.
The arithmetic average of the responses.
The middle value of the ordered responses.
The most frequently occurring response value.
The smallest value in the range of responses.
The largest value in the range of responses.
A measure of the dispersion or spread of responses.
The proportion of responses that are missing or incomplete.
The type or nature of the variable, indicated as numeric in this case.
The specific columns and width used for recording the variable in the dataset.

relationships.description: Indicates the frequency of responses before any weighting is applied.
Indicates the arithmetic average value of the survey responses.
Indicates the middle value in the ordered list of survey responses.
Indicates the most frequently occurring value among the survey responses.
Indicates the smallest value among the survey responses.
Indicates the largest value among the survey responses.
Indicates the spread or dispersion of the survey responses.
Indicates the proportion of responses that are missing or incomplete.
Indicates the type or nature of the variable.
Indicates where the variable information is located in the dataset.
